title: The Future of AI in Finance
description: Exploring AI advisors, blockchain, crypto, and future careers in finance.

sections.heading: What Are AI Advisors?
sections.text: AI customer advisors provide 24/7 personalized financial advice using your spending and behavioral data.

sections.heading: How They Work
sections.text: They analyze transactions, goals, and risk levels to guide users on budgeting and investments.

sections.heading: What is Cryptocurrency?
sections.text: A digital currency not controlled by any central authority. Examples: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana.

sections.heading: What is Blockchain?
sections.text: A decentralized ledger that records secure and transparent transactions.

sections.heading: Skills Needed
sections.text: Understanding AI, data science, coding, and financial literacy prepares students for future roles.
